caption.p: Ovine foetuses congenitally infected with Schmallenberg virus; image ( a) & ( b) from the same lamb presenting with severe arthrogryposis of all four limbs, torticollis, brachygnathia infectior and skeletal muscle hypoplasia. Image ( c) of a second lamb presenting with scoliosis and bending and twisting of the forelimbs. Images courtesy of Cosme Sanchez Miguel, DAFM, Ireland
